rules.rule_text: Coca-Cola Zero Logo must not be used for anything other than the trademarks incorporating 'Coca-Cola' and 'Zero'.
The Coca-Cola Zero Logo must not be altered or modified.
Use only the approved versions of the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Standard Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be used on a white background.
Reversed Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be used on a black background.
Coca-Cola Zero Logo can only be used in the specified color palette.
Coca-Cola Zero Logo can be used on etched, embossed, sandblasted, or spot varnished materials, but the color can be the same as the substrate.
Restricted-use Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be used on a white background.
Restricted-use reverse Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be used on a black background.
Surround the Coca-Cola Zero Logo with clear space equal to the height of the hyphen connecting 'Coca' and 'Cola'.
Minimum print size of the TM must be at least 1 mm (0.04 inches) in diameter.
Minimum onscreen size of the TM must be at least 6 pixels in diameter.
The TM should be scaled up to ensure legibility, always scale the TM from the top edge.
The TM must not be less than 1/4 of the diameter of the TM.
Cropping rules may be granted if the market is considered mature and a Brand approval process is followed.
Do not use any other version of the Coke logo.
Do not remove or reposition the TM.
Do not add elements.
Do not add gloves to the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Do not add strokes or outlines to the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Do not alter the Coca-Cola Zero Logo disproportionately.
Do not rotate the Coca-Cola Zero Logo or create false perspectives.
Do not distort the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Do not enlarge Zero separately.
Do not reduce zero separately.
Do not create a black disk icon.
Do not place on any color other than black.
Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be used in a horizontal version.
Coca-Cola Zero Logo must not be altered.
The black background is preferred for the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Visibility and legibility must always be maintained.
Minimum clear space around the logo must be maintained.

parameters.clear_space: equal to the height of the 'C' in 'Coca'

rules.rule_text: Coca-Cola Zero Logo must always sit above the other logo.
Clear space between Coca-Cola Zero Logo and the logo beneath it must be equal to 6 times the height of the hyphen connecting 'Coca' and 'Cola'.
A black horizontal rule must bisect the clear space between the two logos.
The distance from the leftmost edge of the capital 'C' in 'Coca' to the rightmost edge of the capital 'C' in 'Cola' must be maintained.
The right edge of the other logo must never exceed the height of the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
The Coca-Cola Zero Logo must be positioned to the left of the other logo.
The baseline of the Coca-Cola Zero Logo must align with the baseline of the capital 'C' in 'Cola'.
Logo must be angled at 20 degrees.
Preferred background is black.
Visibility and legibility must always be maintained.
Maintain a clear space around the logo.

parameters.min_clear_space: height of the hyphen between 'Coca' and 'Cola'

rules.rule_text: Logo must not be rotated.
Logo must be displayed at a minimum angle of 20 degrees.
Logo must be positioned within the contour bottle.
Logo should be cropped off 2 edges as shown.
Surround the Coke Zero Logo with clear space.

parameters.min_clear_space: width of the top of the 'k' in 'Coke'

rules.rule_text: The TM must be at least 1 mm (0.04 inches) in diameter.
Display the script at least 100 pixels wide and the TM at least 6 pixels in diameter.
Align the top edge of the TM with the top of the 'k' in 'Zero'.
When using the logo in smaller sizes, scale the TM as needed to ensure legibility.
The distance between the clear space and the bottom of the 'k' in 'Zero' must be at least 14% of the total diameter of the TM.
Use the horizontal version of the Coke Zero Logo for shelf strips.
The Coke Zero Logo must not be altered.
Choose the logo based on visibility and legibility.
Maintain a clear space around the logo.

parameters.clear_space_height: height of the half-circle formed inside the top of the 'e' in 'Zero'

rules.rule_text: Use only the approved versions of the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not alter the shape of the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not use unapproved images of the Contour Bottle.
Contour Bottle Symbol must be adapted to be consistent with the standard 3D form.
Coca-Cola Red and 'Zero' must be used in the Brand Standards.
The shape of the Contour Bottle Symbol can be formed by surrounding illustrations.
Illustrations surrounding the Contour Bottle Symbol are not permitted to alter its shape.
Contour Bottle Symbol must remain the same and not be cropped.
Contour Bottle Symbol must be shown in specific colors.
Avoid using colors outside the Brand color palette.

parameters.caveat: Do not use colors even if they are in the Brand color palette.

rules.rule_text: Surround the Contour Bottle Symbol with clear space that is, at a minimum, the x-height of the 'o' in 'Cola'.
The safe area is only relevant for the Contour Bottle Symbol's position within the page; elements can surround it for other executions.
Clear space can be omitted at the top for certain applications, such as fountain cups and stadium boardings, but keep the minimum clear space along the sides.
Minimum print size for the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Minimum onscreen size for the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not use an older version of the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not add drop shadows or patterns behind the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not add strikes or outlines to the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not remove or separate the elements of the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not add elements to the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not alter the Spencerian Script on the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not rotate the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Do not scale or resize the Contour Bottle Symbol disproportionately.
Do not skew the Contour Bottle Symbol or create false perspectives.
Do not place the Contour Bottle Symbol on unapproved colors.
Do not ignore the clear space alignment or cropping rules for the Contour Bottle Symbol.
Dynamic Ribbon must follow the Coca-Cola Zero Logo and Contour Bottle Symbol.
Dynamic Ribbon is optional and must be used according to the Trademark Usage guidelines.
Only use the approved versions of the Dynamic Ribbon available on the Design Machine website.
The legal name is Dynamic Ribbon Device.
Consult with your local legal counsel for usage guidance.
Ribbon needs to bleed off an execution.
Maximum limitations for ribbon impact are necessary.
Use the Dynamic Ribbon alone or as a connecting device with other design elements.
Do not alter the distinctive shape of the Dynamic Ribbon from the approved form as shown in the Brand Standards.
Do not crop the Dynamic Ribbon more than from using it with other Brand Elements or graphics.
Do not use a section of the Dynamic Ribbon with a design element in a manner that obscures the identifying 'kitchen-sink' thin line.
If approved usage of the Dynamic Ribbon excludes the Coca-Cola Zero Logo, it must be included as shown on this page.
Use the restricted-use Dynamic Ribbon as black on a white background.
Use the Dynamic Ribbon as silver on a white background.
Use the White Dynamic Ribbon on a black background.
Align hyphen with the 'z' in Zero.
Space between the Coca-Cola Zero Logo and Ribbon must equal the height of the hyphen.
The height of the Dynamic Ribbon must not overlap with the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
The space ratio between the Coca-Cola Zero Logo and Ribbon is defined as 4h.
Dynamic Ribbon must not be altered or distorted in any way.
Dynamic Ribbon must not overlap with any Brand Element.
Design elements must not cover more than 1/3 of the Dynamic Ribbon.
No colors other than black or white are allowed for the Dynamic Ribbon.
Dynamic Ribbon must not be rotated, except for 90° counterclockwise rotation.
Dynamic Ribbon must not be cropped unevenly.
Dynamic Ribbon must not be cropped.
Proper space must be allowed for the Dynamic Ribbon.
Coca-Cola Zero Logo must not be altered in any way.
Standard proportions must be maintained for the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Older versions of the Dynamic Ribbon must not be used.
Use only the approved versions of the Coca-Cola Zero Arden Square.
Coca-Cola Zero must be executed in one color on a black background.
For media where color is not an option, use the restricted-use Arden Square in black and white.
Maintain clear space around the Arden Square.

parameters.min_clear_space: distance from bottom of 'o' to top of 'C'

rules.rule_text: Minimum print size must be adhered to.
Minimum onscreen size must be at least 6 pixels in diameter.
Do not alter the shape or proportions of the Arden Square.
Do not change the placement of the Dynamic Ribbon in the Arden Square.
Do not alter the proper space ratio of the layout of the Dynamic Ribbon and The Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Do not use the restricted version of the Arden Square, except in the 'Color' page in this chapter.
Do not use an older version of the Arden Square.
Black must predominate all executions.
Coke Red must be used to create dynamic framing.
Black color specifications.
Coke Red color specifications.
Silver color specifications.
White color specifications.
Do not use unapproved colors.
Do not screen or tint the Brand colors.
Do not omit Coke Red from layouts.
Do not create layouts in which black or red are not the dominant colors.
Do not use secondary Brand colors as primary Brand colors.
Do not add gradients or multiple tones of color to the Brand colors.
Do not use breakdowns of the Brand colors.
Do not use unapproved colors for the Coca-Cola Zero Logo.
Do not ignore the color rules specific to each Element in the Brand Standards.
Do not use RGB or HEX breakdowns instead.
Use Gotham Bold for headlines on all executions and brand communications.
Use Gotham Book for body copy on all brand communications.
Use Gotham Medium for functional messages only, such as pricing or calls to action.
If Gotham is unavailable, use Arial as a replacement for internal communications.
The Coca-Cola Company does not have global rights to any of the Brand fonts.
Use Gotham Book for body copy.
Headlines should be in Gotham Bold.
Body copy size should be 9 pt. type with 11 pt. leading.
Headlines size should be 10 pt. type with 12 pt. leading.
Call-to-action copy should always be in all lowercase.
Currency symbols should be reduced to 0.5 of the total height of the numbers.
Use Gotham Medium for the offer and sub-head.
Align text left, right, or centered as appropriate.
Do not use fonts other than those in the Gotham family for consumer-facing executions.
Do not use Arial in consumer-facing executions.
Do not use any font other than Gotham Bold as the primary headline font.
Do not use Gotham Medium for body copy.
Do not use Gotham Condensed for body copy.
Black is the primary background color.
White can be used as a background color.
Product photography should evoke craving for the liquid.
Product photography must highlight the uniqueness of the liquid.
Photography should reflect the smooth familiarity of the Contour Bottle.
Product photography must elicit positive emotional reactions.
Photo must capture the contour bottle with minimal perspective distortion.
Product angle should have very little perspective.
Product color should include highlights of sunset oranges and yellows.
Product color should include darkness of dark chocolate with hints of caramel and deep reds.
Photo should ideally express the Coca-Cola Zero product.
Use a chrome reflective card directly behind the product.
Use two soft boxes for front lighting and a soft light for back lighting.
Refreshment cues should be used sparingly and have the right balance.
Uplifting product bubbles must be present.
Maintain correct balance of condensation.
Maximize script size.
Maintain darks and highlights.
